mapper.select: SELECT te.task_eval_id, te.task_eval_name, te.task_eval_content, te.score, te.set_ratio, te.task_grade, te.performance_input, te.created_at, te.rel_eval_status, te.evaluation_id, te.modifiable_date, te.task_type_id, te.task_item_id FROM task_eval te INNER JOIN evaluation e ON te.evaluation_id = e.evaluation_id INNER JOIN task_item ti ON te.task_item_id = ti.task_item_id WHERE e.employee_id = #{empId} AND e.year = #{year} AND e.half = #{half}

SELECT te.task_eval_id, te.task_eval_name, te.task_eval_content, te.score, te.set_ratio, te.task_grade, te.performance_input, te.created_at, te.rel_eval_status, te.evaluation_id, te.modifiable_date, te.task_type_id, te.task_item_id FROM task_eval te WHERE te.task_eval_id = #{taskEvalId}

SELECT te.task_eval_id, te.task_eval_name, te.task_eval_content, te.score, te.set_ratio, te.task_grade, te.performance_input, te.created_at, te.rel_eval_status, te.evaluation_id, te.modifiable_date, te.task_type_id, te.task_item_id FROM task_eval te WHERE te.evaluation_id = #{evaluationId}
